abilities.name: Soul-shaking Roar
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.description: Defiant in the face of any foe, Krondys issues an ear-shattering roar at those who dare face him.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Atavistic Tempest
abilities.description: Wielding the power of Azyr alongside the lost magics of the Draconith empire, Krondys barrages the enemy with elemental storms.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target until the start of your next turn:

Blinding Gales: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks.

Meteor-hail: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target's weapons.

Flash-freezing Blizzard: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target.
